articles.author: Nathan DiCamillo
articles.title: Crypto M&A and Fundraising Dropped Sharply in 2019: PwC Report
articles.description: The value of crypto M&A deals last year dropped by a whopping 76 percent, according to a new report by PwC – down from $1.9 billion in 2018 to $451 million in 2019.
articles.content:
Crypto companies kept buying each other last year even as both M&A and funding deal flow in the industry took a dive, according to a report released Monday by PwC.
On the M&A side, crypto-native acquirers took 56 percent of the deal flow, compared to… [+3103 chars]
